scripts.dev: lsof -ti :8787 | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null; scripts/generate-wrangler-config.sh --env dev && infisical run --env dev -- sh -c 'bun run build && bun run wrangler dev'
scripts.deploy:staging: scripts/generate-wrangler-config.sh --env staging && infisical run --environment staging -- sh -c 'bun run build && wrangler deploy'
scripts.deploy:prod: scripts/generate-wrangler-config.sh --env prod && infisical run --environment prod -- sh -c 'bun run build && wrangler deploy'
scripts.test:e2e: infisical run --env dev -- npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: infisical run --env dev -- npx playwright test --ui
